system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.7mVBPbMawQ47bTbY]{Brutal Throw}

Benefits

When already making an attack with a throwing knife/star, glave, throwing axe, brick, or giant throwing star, the character may throw the same kind of weapon they made the attack with, at the same target with a -4 penalty to attack. If the attack is successful, it deals +1 damage die to that target.
